title: On the plots having total construction area 20,000 Sq
clause_text: On the plots having total construction area 20,000 Sq.mt & above Bio- degradable Waste Treatment Plant of required capacity shall be provided and maintained.

source_pdf.text_snippet: On the plots having total construction area 20,000 Sq.mt & above Bio- degradable Waste Treatment Plant of required capacity shall be provided and maintained.
